description:
Mixxx 2.5.1, the latest version of this open-source, cross-platform, and free virtual DJ software for performing live mixes, was released today with various improvements and …

The post Mixxx 2.5.1 Adds Mapping for the DJ TechTools MIDI Fighter Spectra Controller appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Mixxx 2.5.1 Adds Mapping for the DJ TechTools MIDI Fighter Spectra Controller
